item.title: 19 hurt as APSRTC bus veers off road in Jogulamba Gadwal dist
item.description:
<![CDATA[
Hyderabad: As many as 19 passengers were injured when an Andhra Pradesh State Road Transport Corporation (APSRTC) bus veered off the highway in the Jogulamba Gadwal district on Thursday morning.According to the local police, the bus was travelling from Ameerpet to Anantapur in Andhra Pradesh. The accident occurred at around 4 am, when the bus veered off the highway and rolled onto its side.Passers-by alerted the police, who arrived at the scene and helped the passengers out of the bus.
